statements: SELECT * FROM identity_theft_data;
SELECT victim_name, theft_location FROM identity_theft_data ORDER BY theft_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM identity_theft_data WHERE theft_location = 'New York';
SELECT victim_name, theft_date FROM identity_theft_data WHERE victim_address LIKE '%Ave%' ORDER BY theft_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_thefts FROM identity_theft_data;
SELECT * FROM identity_theft_data WHERE theft_location = 'New York' ORDER BY theft_date DESC;
SELECT victim_name, theft_location FROM identity_theft_data WHERE theft_date > '2021-01-01' AND theft_location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT victim_name, victim_address FROM identity_theft_data WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY victim_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT theft_location FROM identity_theft_data WHERE theft_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_thefts, theft_location FROM identity_theft_data GROUP BY theft_location ORDER BY total_thefts DESC, theft_location ASC;
SELECT * FROM identity_theft_cases;
SELECT victim_name, theft_location, theft_date FROM identity_theft_cases;
SELECT case_id, theft_date, victim_name FROM identity_theft_cases WHERE theft_location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT method_name, description FROM theft_methods;
SELECT * FROM theft_methods WHERE method_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM identity_theft_cases WHERE theft_location = 'New York';
SELECT victim_name, theft_date FROM identity_theft_cases WHERE theft_location IS NULL;
SELECT i.victim_name, t.method_name FROM identity_theft_cases i JOIN theft_methods t ON i.case_id = t.method_id;
SELECT theft_date, theft_location FROM identity_theft_cases WHERE theft_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31';
SELECT i.victim_name, t.method_name FROM identity_theft_cases i LEFT JOIN theft_methods t ON i.case_id = t.method_id WHERE t.method_name LIKE '%phishing%';
SELECT * FROM identity_theft_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT victim_name, identity_theft_type FROM identity_theft_reports WHERE location='New York'
SELECT report_id, victim_name, location FROM identity_theft_reports WHERE report_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT count(*) FROM stolen_identities
SELECT * FROM identity_theft_patterns ORDER BY frequency DESC
SELECT * FROM identity_theft_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT victim_name, report_date, identity_theft_type FROM identity_theft_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM stolen_identities WHERE stolen_date >= '2020-01-01' AND stolen_date <= '2021-01-01';
SELECT pattern_name, frequency, location FROM identity_theft_patterns WHERE frequency > 10 ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT victim_name, identity_theft_type FROM identity_theft_reports WHERE location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT * FROM identity_theft_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_date, victim_name FROM identity_theft_reports;
SELECT victim_name, theft_method FROM identity_theft_reports ORDER BY theft_method ASC;
SELECT location_id, location_name, city, state FROM theft_locations WHERE country='USA';
SELECT suspect_name, age, gender, occupation, location_name FROM suspect_info JOIN theft_locations ON suspect_info.location_id = theft_locations.location_id;
SELECT * FROM identity_theft_reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT victim_name, theft_method FROM identity_theft_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM theft_locations WHERE city = 'New York' AND country = 'USA';
SELECT suspect_name, age, occupation, location_name FROM suspect_info INNER JOIN theft_locations ON suspect_info.location_id = theft_locations.location_id;
SELECT theft_method, COUNT(report_id) AS num_reports FROM identity_theft_reports GROUP BY theft_method ORDER BY num_reports DESC;
SELECT * FROM IdentityTheftReports;
SELECT report_date, victim_name, location FROM IdentityTheftReports WHERE theft_method = 'Phishing';
SELECT AVG(total_reports) AS average_reports_per_year FROM IdentityTheftStatistics;
SELECT * FROM IdentityTheftAlerts WHERE alert_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT pattern_name, common_theft_methods FROM IdentityTheftPatterns ORDER BY pattern_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM IdentityTheftReports WHERE report_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT victim_name, location FROM IdentityTheftReports WHERE perpetrator_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM IdentityTheftPatterns ORDER BY average_victims_per_pattern DESC;
SELECT suspect_name, known_aliases, last_known_location FROM IdentityTheftSuspects WHERE last_known_location LIKE '%city%';
SELECT year, total_reports, total_victims, total_perpetrators FROM IdentityTheftStatistics WHERE year BETWEEN 2018 AND 2020;
